summary: REAR SUSPENSION ON MY 2005 GMC ENVOY DENALI HAS AN AIR LOAD LEVELING SYSTEM.  IT CONTINUOUSLY DEFLATES.  MANUFACTURES OWNERS MANUAL SAYS AFTER 3 DAYS OF NON-USE WILL IT DEFLATE.  WHILE DRIVING, THE AIR COMPRESSOR STARTS INTERMITTENTLY TO INFLATE IT BACK UP.  THIS STARTED IN OCTOBER OF 2008, AND CONTINUES TO THIS DAY. *TR
